scripts.watch: node-sass themes/ciata-theme/assets/sass -o themes/ciata-theme/static/css/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.compile:css: node-sass themes/ciata-theme/assets/sass/ -o themes/ciata-theme/static/css/ && stylelint '*.css' --fix || true && stylelint '*.css' --fix
